com.google.template.soy.basetree

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractOperatorNode, AbstractParentExprNode, AbstractParentNode, AbstractParentSoyCommandNode, AbstractParentSoyNode, CallNode, CallParamContentNode, DataRefNode, ExprRootNode, ForeachIfemptyNode, ForeachNode, ForeachNonemptyNode, ForNode, FunctionNode, GoogMsgNode, IfCondNode, IfElseNode, IfNode, MsgHtmlTagNode, MsgNode, OperatorNodes.AndOpNode, OperatorNodes.ConditionalOpNode, OperatorNodes.DivideByOpNode, OperatorNodes.EqualOpNode, OperatorNodes.GreaterThanOpNode, OperatorNodes.GreaterThanOrEqualOpNode, OperatorNodes.LessThanOpNode, OperatorNodes.LessThanOrEqualOpNode, OperatorNodes.MinusOpNode, OperatorNodes.ModOpNode, OperatorNodes.NegativeOpNode, OperatorNodes.NotEqualOpNode, OperatorNodes.NotOpNode, OperatorNodes.OrOpNode, OperatorNodes.PlusOpNode, OperatorNodes.TimesOpNode, PrintNode, SoyFileNode, SoyFileSetNode, SwitchCaseNode, SwitchDefaultNode, SwitchNode, TemplateNode
public interface ParentNode<N extends Node>
extends Node

A node that may have children in the parse tree.

Important: Do not use outside of Soy code (treat as superpackage-private).

The parameter N represents the interface or class that is the superclass of all possible children for this ParentNode. E.g. for a Soy parse tree node, N is usually SoyNode, but for SoyFileSetNode N is SoyFileNode, for SoyFileNode N is TemplateNode, etc; for a Soy expression parse tree, N is usually ExprNode.

          Appends the tree strings for all the children to the given StringBuilder, at one further indentation level (3 spaces) than the given current indentation level.
